abstract.p: Roundup of recent advertising account changes (S)

block.p: * United Distillers and Vintners, Harlow, England, part of Diageo P.L.C., to Bartle Bogle Hegarty, London, 49 percent owned by the B Com3 Group, to handle creative work for its Gordon's Gin brand in Britain, which had been at the London office of Leo Burnett Worldwide, also part of B Com3 . Billings were estimated at $4.5 million.

* United Distillers and Vintners, Harlow, England, part of Diageo P.L.C., to Bartle Bogle Hegarty, London, 49 percent owned by the B Com3 Group, to handle creative work for its Gordon's Gin brand in Britain, which had been at the London office of Leo Burnett Worldwide, also part of B Com3 . Billings were estimated at $4.5 million.

* The Clio Awards, Miami, part of VNU, to Turkel Schwartz & Partners, Coconut Grove, Fla., to handle the creative account for its festival, which will be held for the first time on South Beach in 2001. Spending for the account, which had been at Dweck Inc., New York, was estimated at less than $1 million.
